scripts.dev: concurrently -n server,web -c blue,green "pnpm -C apps/server dev" "pnpm -C apps/web dev"
scripts.dev:electron: concurrently -n server,web,electron -c blue,green,magenta "pnpm -C apps/server dev" "pnpm -C apps/web dev --host 127.0.0.1 --port 5173 --strictPort" "pnpm -C apps/electron dev"
scripts.build: pnpm -C apps/web build && pnpm -C apps/server build
scripts.typecheck: pnpm -C apps/web typecheck && pnpm -C apps/server typecheck && pnpm -C apps/electron typecheck
